stories.text: We want to enroll my nephew in an international school in Mumbai. I have been reviewing Oberoi International School since few days. I found OIS is really one of the best IB school in Mumbai. The school has a great modern infrastructure and educational environment. They also offer scholarships to those students who meet the scholarship eligibility criteria. What is your review on OIS?
stories.title: What Is Your Review for Oberoi International School?
Guide to Communicating Between Arduino and Computer: Serial Functionality

stories.text: We had a fireside chat with Stanford psychology professor James Gross, who is an expert in emotion regulation. They discussed topics such as effective strategies for managing emotions and stress management, the usage of emotion suppression, and cognitive reappraisal. Check out more useful practices and content here: https://amotionsinc.com/ #emotionalconnection #emotions #emotionalintelligence #wellbeingatwork #stressmanagement #culture #happinesss #mentalhealth https://youtu.be/acEv4tE6aII
stories.title: Fireside Chat with Stanford Psychology Professor on Emotion Regulation

stories.text: My official MacBook is governed by MDM(Mobile Device Management) by my employer using Intune. If I configure my personal Apple ID to my MacBook would there be any privacy issue,
stories.title: Ask HN: My Mac is governed by MDM from my employer, is there any privacy issue?
